interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Pet Supplies Self Cleaning Slicker Brush, Dog Brush for Shedding [Upgraded Pain-free Bristles] Cat Deshedding Brush, Reduces Shedding and Tangling for Hair, with Stainless Steel Pet Comb (Purple) Review Date: 2021/11/25 Store: FIOVIEL Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'FIOVIEL', 'Special Feature': 'Self Cleaning', 'Unit Count': '100000.00 Count', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Material': 'Wool', 'Product Dimensions': '7 x 5 x 2.8 inches; 9.91 Ounces', 'UPC': '705116975999'} Review Text: Incredibly easy to use and to clean.
Brush your dog or cat as you normally would, and after a couple of strokes, take a look at the bristles. You'll be amazed at how much hair this brush has accumulated (we have medium to short hair cats).

I would not recommend this brush for pets that have long hair, unless you're looking to groom just the top layer of fur. otherwise, you can not reach through all of the fur to get to the base to fully smooth and groom your pet.

Instead of using your hands to try to grasp all of the hair to clean the brush, you simply press the button on the back, which pushes the brush pad forward and gives you a 'pillow' of pet hair that is EASILY removeable!

Highly recommend this pet brush! Review Title: Wide head Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Frecia’s Allure Rose Quartz Face Roller Gua Sha Set – Brazilian Rose Quartz Gua Sha Stone Set with Neck & Face Sculpting Tool & Eye Massager Mini Facial Roller – 4-Tool Lymphatic Drainage Massager Set Frecia's Allure ['PAMPER YOURSELF WITH LUXURIOUS, PROFESSIONAL-GRADE SKINCARE Your skin is your best accessory – choose your tools wisely. When it comes to your skincare, you need durable, long-lasting skincare tools you can rely on for a consistent daily routine – not low-quality, poorly made gua sha and face rollers that chip and fall apart after just a few uses. At Frecia’s Allure, we use only 100% pure Brazilian Rose Quartz in our Rose Quartz Facial Roller & Gua Sha Kit, for skincare tools that won’t chip or crack. Our die-cast, single-piece roller handles are rust-resistant, and while many gua sha tools are disappointingly thin and frail, our Gua Sha is thick and substantial – for a comfortable hand feel and broader skin contact. Squeaky facial rollers spoiling your zen at-home spa session? Our face rollers are crafted with special silicone inserts to eliminate noise – so you can enjoy quiet, relaxing home skincare sessions. The Frecia’s Allure Rose Quartz Facial Roller & Gua Sha Kit includes: - Large Dual Roller Tool (6”) – 1 Smooth Roller (for facial massage and a circulation boost) and 1 Ridged Roller (for a deeper massage to help with lymphatic drainage) - Mini Roller Tool (4”) to combat dark circles and puffiness around eyes - Gua Sha (3”) for sculpting around the chin and jawline - Gift Box & Travel Carrying Case with magnetic closure and individual tool compartments - Storage Pouch for chilling your skincare tools in the fridge - Diagram & Instructions THE PERFECT DE-STRESS GIFT This Rose Quartz Facial Roller & Gua Sha Kit is wonderful for indulging in some much-needed “me” time. Gift our complete gua sha and face roller set to friends, family, and loved ones who could use a soothing relaxation ritual to wind down at the end of the day. SOOTHE PUFFY SKIN & TIRED EYES For a calming, effective de-puffing solution, chill your gua sha and face rollers in the fridge before smoothing over your skin. Your face will feel refreshed and rejuvenated – and appear t'] {'Material': 'Stone', 'Brand': "Frecia's Allure", 'Is Cordless?': 'Yes', 'Product Grade': 'Home', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Not Water Resistant', 'Product Dimensions': '7 x 7.25 x 1.5 inches; 12.7 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'AA', 'UPC': '712198125358', 'Manufacturer': "Frecia's Allure"} My wife ordered three different stones (this set, and two individual stones) and this one 'worked" for her but was not her favorite.
The cost is more (about $3) than the individual stones, but the texture and the feel against her skin is very different.
The thickness of the stones are better than average, but they are not as comfortable as a thicker stone would be. It's "ok" Ballsy Quickys Body Wipes – 15 Extra Large Body Cleansing Wipes – Pocket Shower Wipes w/ Aloe & Cucumber Extracts – Refreshing Bathing Wipes For Gym, Camping & Travel – Cruelty, Paraben-Free Ballsy {'Brand': 'Ballsy', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Unit Count': '15 Count', 'Number of Items': '15', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '9.53 x 8.7 x 3.07 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'UPC': '810093270057'} I have an elderly relative that isn't always physically able to step into the shower, so these wipes are a blessing.

Thick and durable enough to get rid of most dirt and grime. A nice pleasant fresh smell of cucumbers that doesn't linger on the skin for hours.

Very convenient to use, whether at home or in the car on very hot days.

if you break down the price, it will cost you about $1 a wipe. That can be pricey for a typical wipe, but it is invaluable for a piece of mind when it comes to assisting an elderly relative.

Highly recommend these wipes! Great for seniors OSRSR Cryo Sticks,Unbreakable Stainless Steel Beauty Ice Facial Massage Tools for Woman,Skin Case Ice Globes Cryo Spoons,Cooling Globes Cold Globes for Face,Eyes & Neck OSRSR {'Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Brand': 'OSRSR', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Not Water Resistant', 'Package Dimensions': '7.91 x 5.63 x 2.24 inches; 11.68 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'OSRSR021', 'UPC': '726324604273', 'Manufacturer': 'OSRSR'} Who woulda thought that something ice-cold and under six inches would put a smile on your face?
Just put these tools in the freezer for AT LEAST two hours before you are planning on using them and you will be very happy with the results.
They do not stick to your skin and they do not give you the 'shock' of someone putting a cold can of soda on the back of your neck.
The worst part about these massage tools is that the silicon tips (handles) should be longer so that not only can you hold them easier but also so that your hands don't freeze while using the massager.
A convenient carry case/freezer case is included.
Highly recommend! Surprisingly good! BAWYU | All is Made of Bamboo Sustainable Gifts | Toothbrush, Body Brush, Bamboo Fiber Towel, Comb, Storage bag | Guest Room Essentials Bathroom, Home Preparation Products | Shower Wash Kit （6 Pack） BAWYU {'Package Dimensions': '8.03 x 5.24 x 2.2 inches; 10.05 Ounces', 'UPC': '723890958878'} Everything is very lightweight, which is nice, but the toothbrushes are so light that they tip over VERY easily. Also, unlike other typical toothbrushes, there is no flexibility to them. After repeated use (and rinsing), the handle just doesn't feel as clean and comfortable to me.

No tray was included (as the product picture shows), but that's fine. I wouldn't be keeping my toothbrush with an exfoliating pad anyway. Would have enjoyed the exfoliating brush more if the handle loop had just a little more space to allow me to fit my hand through it to hold the brush properly.

The comb has very wide teeth, which is good for long, thick hair just after washing. But if you don't have long, thick hair... it's pretty much useless. Would've been nice if the handle of the comb had a notch or a groove to allow for a better grip.

If you're thinking of buying this as a gift for someone... don't. Unless it's for a child/teen. There are too many other better sets out there. It's ok... Pet Supplies Self Cleaning Slicker Brush, Dog Brush for Shedding [Upgraded Pain-free Bristles] Cat Deshedding Brush, Reduces Shedding and Tangling for Hair, with Stainless Steel Pet Comb (Purple) FIOVIEL {'Brand': 'FIOVIEL', 'Special Feature': 'Self Cleaning', 'Unit Count': '100000.00 Count', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Material': 'Wool', 'Product Dimensions': '7 x 5 x 2.8 inches; 9.91 Ounces', 'UPC': '705116975999'} Incredibly easy to use and to clean.
Brush your dog or cat as you normally would, and after a couple of strokes, take a look at the bristles. You'll be amazed at how much hair this brush has accumulated (we have medium to short hair cats).

I would not recommend this brush for pets that have long hair, unless you're looking to groom just the top layer of fur. otherwise, you can not reach through all of the fur to get to the base to fully smooth and groom your pet.

Instead of using your hands to try to grasp all of the hair to clean the brush, you simply press the button on the back, which pushes the brush pad forward and gives you a 'pillow' of pet hair that is EASILY removeable!

Highly recommend this pet brush! Wide head
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Interest in Skincare and Personal Care Tools:** The user values quality skincare and personal care tools that enhance their routines, emphasizing durability and effectiveness in products, particularly those made from high-quality materials.

- **Material Preferences:** They prefer sustainable materials, leaning towards eco-friendly options like bamboo and natural stones, reflecting a modern approach to wellness.

- **Support for Relaxation and Pampering:** The user appreciates products that foster relaxation and self-care, balancing physical beauty routines with mental wellness.

- **Value for Money:** Sensitive to pricing yet willing to invest in premium products when justified by clear benefits, the user maintains a discerning perspective on cost-effectiveness.

- **Family Influence:** Family considerations guide their purchasing decisions significantly, highlighting a commitment to shared interests in skincare and wellness within their household.

- **Pet Care Engagement:** The user shows an interest in pet care products that enhance convenience and functionality, suggesting an expanding focus on the well-being of household pets alongside family members.

- **Rating Adjustment Tendency:** They reflect a methodical approach to evaluating products, adjusting ratings based on personal experiences.

- **Practical Considerations:** A recent emphasis on practicality and ease of use in personal care and pet products speaks to their caregiving role and commitment to enhancing the comfort of both loved ones and pets.

- **Gift Suitability Awareness:** The user is attuned to the importance of product suitability for specific audiences, demonstrating cautiousness in recommending items as gifts.

Overall, the user highlights a commitment to quality, effective skincare, and practicality, prioritizing the well-being of their family and pets while balancing considerations of cost and value.
